title: Justification on why partial services are not offered.
content:
Why does the Google device support dont offer partial support. When I am facing issues only with the screen's display glass, why should I pay for all the other listed issues where in I dont have any issues using the phone as it is.

An estimation of 28k for an absolutely working fine mobile phone is something which any customer would deny paying.

A proper justification here would help me. As I have got no other option apart from throwing the phone I loved to garbage.
